paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for BRCA2, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The MMC-sensitive FA patient-derived AML cell line SB1690CB (BRCA2 mutations IVS7+2T>G and 3827delGT10) was grown in soft gel colony forming assays in the presence of MMC (10–30 nM).

functional_data.summary: The IVS7+2T>G mutation is associated with alternative splicing contributing to BRCA2 function.

variants.segregation_data: Not applicable as this is a cell line study.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is part of a compound heterozygous state with another BRCA2 mutation.
key_quotes: The dominant transcript in SBRes cells, which was not detected in sensitive SB1690CB cells, has a deletion of exons 5 and 7, BRCA2ΔE5+7.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
